column4: Three lanes inbound and one lane outbound from 3:00 p.m. to 4 p.m.
Normal lane configuration from 4 p.m. to 7 p.m.
Three lanes outbound and one lane inbound from 7:00 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.

column3: Traffic Advisory for Old Frankfort Pike:
column4: There is currently traffic congestion primarily on the inbound side between New Circle Rd and S Forbes Rd due to the Lexington Paper Shred.  The outbound side is also experiencing some delays.

column3: Traffic Advisory for Old Frankfort Pike:
column4: Motorists NOT needing paper shredded should consider an alternate route.  This event will continue until 2 p.m. on Saturday 10/3.
